metadata.description: Security-focused GCP compliance check functions grouped by SDK packages - non-security functions removed
focus_areas: Identity & Access: MFA, unused users, overprivileged roles
Network: VPC flow logs, firewall rules, exposed public IPs
Compute: Shielded VM, OS Login, metadata exposure
Storage: Bucket encryption, public access, retention
Logging/Monitoring: Admin activity logs, log retention
Key & Secrets Management: CMEK, rotation, expiration
API Security: Enabled APIs, OAuth Scopes, API Gateway security
Container Security: GKE security posture, workload identity, node shielding
DNS & IAM Policies: DNSSEC, IAM role bindings
Other Threat Surfaces: External IPs, service account key usage, public images
metadata.sdk_validation: All functions can be validated via GCP SDK API using Python client libraries
enhancements: Comprehensive coverage of all GCP security surfaces
Enhanced security focus with threat surface coverage
Better categorization by service and resource type
Programmatically verifiable via GCP SDK APIs
Exhaustive list covering all major GCP services
filtering_criteria: Removed cost optimization functions (billing, quota, pricing, etc.)
Kept only security-related functions (access control, encryption, network security, etc.)
